items.title: Nvidia to resume sales of highly desired AI computer chips to China
items.summary: Nvidia has received approval to sell AI computer chips to China, which are highly sought after, potentially boosting its sales and revenue in this market.

items.title: Interview with Mary Diaz, Entrepreneur, Writer, femme feral LLC
items.summary: Interview with Mary Diaz, Entrepreneur, Writer, femme feral LLC discussing her experience in AI and copywriting, and the unique perspective she brings to the intersection of technology and creativity.

items.title: Samsung says you should think of Galaxy Z Fold 7 as a 'trade-off' as it reconsiders S Pen support - 9to5Google
items.summary: Samsung is reconsidering S Pen support for Galaxy Z Fold 7 as a trade-off. Samsung's focus on the future of smartphones is seen as an innovation that Apple has yet to match.

items.title: KDE's Android TV Alternative, Plasma Bigscreen, Rises From the Dead
items.summary: KDE's TV-focused interface, Plasma Bigscreen, is being revived with new updates and improvements by contributor Devin.

items.title: Nvidia to resume sales of highly desired AI computer chips to China
items.summary: Nvidia to resume sales of AI computer chips to China, resulting in shares increasing by over 4%.

items.title: Meta Bets Big on AI With First Supercluster Coming Online in 2026
items.summary: Meta is investing in AI with the activation of its first supercluster, Prometheus, in 2026.

items.title: Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases now supports Amazon OpenSearch Service Managed Cluster as vector store
items.summary: Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases now supports Amazon OpenSearch Service Managed Cluster as vector store, enhancing its capabilities as a fully managed RAG solution.

items.title: The Summer I Turned Pretty Season 3 Episode 1 â€“ Release Date, Schedule, How To Watch
items.summary: The Summer I Turned Pretty Season 3 Episode 1, which is AI-generated, is set to release on July 16 on Prime Video, allowing fans to reunite with Belly, Conrad, and Jeremiah. Inconsistencies may occur due to the use of AI voice technology.

items.title: eg4-mcp-server added to PyPI
items.summary: eg4-mcp-server, a Model Context Protocol server for EG4 solar inverter monitoring and control, has been added to PyPI.

items.title: AI ate code, now it wants cashflows. Is this finance's Copilot moment?"
items.summary: AI-driven financial analysis tool introduced to improve market analysis and investment decision-making in finance sector

items.title: Monitor agents built on Amazon Bedrock with Datadog LLM Observability
items.summary: Monitor agents built on Amazon Bedrock with Datadog LLM Observability, providing visibility and monitoring for agentic applications built on Amazon Bedrock.

items.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders
items.summary: Thinking Machines Lab, founded by former OpenAI researchers including Mira Murati, raised a record $2 billion, now valued at $12 billion and officially out of stealth.

items.title: Microsoft employee uses terrible AI-generated image to advertise for Xbox artists just weeks after massive layoffs
items.summary: Microsoft employee receives backlash for using poor AI-generated image in ad for Xbox artists following recent layoffs.

items.title: AI cloud computing firm announces plans for $6B data center in Lancaster County
items.summary: AI cloud computing firm CoreWeave plans to invest $6 billion in a data center in Lancaster County, marking one of the largest single investments in the region.
